content: The monitoring may have been “incidental,” but it was deliberate. The unmasking of the names is the proof: if the monitoring of the Trump people truly was “incidental,” then there’s no reason their names should’ve been unmasked. If they were only surveilled by accident, then why were their names relevant? The very fact that the names were unmasked belies the bogus claim that the Trump people were merely “swept up” in the surveillance — just collateral damage! Whoops. It was the foreign persons who were “incidentally” monitored. The Trump people were the real targets.
